subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: During his interview with Oprah Winfrey, Lance Armstrong admitted to using banned substances during his cycling career, but he did not explain how he did it or who helped him.
snippet: During his interview with Oprah Winfrey, Lance Armstrong admitted to using banned substances during his cycling career, but he did not explain how he did it or who helped him.
